WECHAT_CHANNEL.TITLE: Add Wechat Official Account
WECHAT_CHANNEL.DESC: Add a Wechat Official Account to your inbox to start receiving messages from your customers.

CHANNEL_NAME.LABEL: Wechat Official Account Name
CHANNEL_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter the name of the official account

EKBOOKING_CHANNEL.TITLE: Ekbooking channel
EKBOOKING_CHANNEL.DESC: Create a channel for your Ekbooking account and start supporting your customers via our Ekbooking integration.

CHANNEL_WELCOME_TAGLINE.LABEL: Welcome Tagline
CHANNEL_WELCOME_TAGLINE.PLACEHOLDER: We make it simple to connect with us. Ask us anything, or share your feedback.

CHANNEL_GREETING_MESSAGE.LABEL: Channel greeting message
CHANNEL_GREETING_MESSAGE.PLACEHOLDER: Acme Inc typically replies in a few hours.

CHANNEL_GREETING_TOGGLE.LABEL: Enable channel greeting
CHANNEL_GREETING_TOGGLE.HELP_TEXT: Auto-send greeting messages when customers start a conversation and send their first message.

REPLY_TIME.TITLE: Set Reply time
REPLY_TIME.HELP_TEXT: This reply time will be displayed on the live chat widget

WIDGET_COLOR.LABEL: Widget Color
WIDGET_COLOR.PLACEHOLDER: Update the widget color used in widget

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: We were not able to create a Ekbooking channel, please try again
